729855f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Minthorne Street
729855f-a.text:
Victory Boulevard, south side, between Minthorne Street and the Upper Bay, showing the site where a new public swimming pool was erected later in the year. The view is southeastward across the site toward the Tompkinsville piers.
June 15, 1935
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, six months later, showing the pool under oonstruction. Note also the old Tompkinsville Station of the
Staten Island Rapid Tranait Railway.
December 11, 1935
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The pooliafter completion. Shown,too,is a newly
erected ramp across the rsilroad tracks.
June 12, 1937
P. L. Sperr
729855f-a.folder: Victory Boulevard & Minthorne Street, Staten Island, NY

729857f-c.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Minthorne Street
729857f-c.text:
Victory Boulevard, south side, between Minthorne Street and the Upper Bay, showing the George Cromwell Center swimming pool. Also shown are the Tompkinsville piers.
August 28, 1937
Views 1, 2, 3
P. L. Sperr

729854f-c.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Minthorne Street
729854f-c.text:
(1)
Victory Boulevard, south side, at Minthorne Street, showing the Tompkinsville Station of the Staten Island Rai iroad. The view is in a southeasterly direction across the Boulevard.
June 13, 1931
LL. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the station, looking north along the tracks. Across the station a.3pear warehouses of the American Dock Company and in the left center background is visible, in silhouette, the Richond Borough
all, in St. George.
January 13, 1931
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The new Tompkinsville Railroad Station. A public swimming pool has been erected on the east
side of the railroad tracks.
October 4, 1936
P. L. Sperr
729854f-c.folder: Victory Boulevard & Minthorne Street, Staten Island, NY

729856f-a.title: Richmond: Victory Boulevard - Minthorne Street
729856f-a.text:
Victory Boulevard, south side, between Minthorne
Street and the Upper Bay, showing under construction, a public swimming pool. One of the Toaapkinsville piers is visible across
the pool.
December 11, 1935
P. L. Sperr
